citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The facility does provide environmental enhancement and social housing (for appropriate species) for the exhibit birds
that they maintain, however a written plan for environmental enhancement that is approved by the attending veterinarian
(AV) is not documented. A written environmental enhancement plan approved by the AV is required and helps ensure that
birds are receiving adequate enrichment. Ensure that a written plan is developed and approved by the attending
veterinarian.
***Correct by July 5, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:

Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
The facility does provide environmental enhancement and social housing (for appropriate species) for the exhibit birds 
that they maintain, however a written plan for environmental enhancement that is approved by the attending veterinarian 
(AV) is not documented. A written environmental enhancement plan approved by the AV is required and helps ensure that
